participant_1.background:
I am a software engineer, but my true passion is geocaching.
i have problems chewing my food.
I am often in pain so I read to distract myself.
I ran my first 5k race with my spouse and child cheering me on.
i love the beatles.

participant_2.background:
I'm a free spirit who enjoys the simple things in life, like wearing flip flops.
I love my pets very much and enjoy spending time with them.
Baseball helps me to relax and temporarily forget about my anxiety.
i just got my rejection letter from the gifted program.
I have a secret tattoo that my dad would hate.

content.text: Not much, just hanging out, you?
Same. I'm a software engineer, but my true passion is geocaching.
That sounds really interesting! I've never heard of it before.
It's basically a treasure hunt, but with GPS coordinates. You find hidden containers called "geocaches" all over the world.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm a free spirit who enjoys the simple things in life, like wearing flip flops.
I love flip flops too! They're so comfortable.
Yeah, they're the best! I also love spending time with my pets. I have two dogs and a cat.
Aww, I love animals! I have a dog and a cat too.
That's awesome! What are their names?
My dog's name is Buddy and my cat's name is Mittens.
Those are great names! I love the Beatles too!
Me too! They're my favorite band.
We have so much in common! I think we're going to be friends.
